text: In the last years of the wheat boom, Bennett had become increasingly  exhausted  frustrated  tired  drained  frustrated  at how the government seemed to be encouraging an  exploitative  intensive  traditional  conventional  exploitative  farming binge. He went directly after his old employer, the Department of Agriculture, for misguided  misplaced  misleading  misgiving misleading  people. Farmers on the Great Plains were working against nature, he  went  made  broadcast  thundered  thundered  in speeches across the country.
